articles.title: Matt Hancock tells holidaymakers to avoid amber list countries - The Times
articles.description: Holidaymakers should avoid whole swathes of Europe despite most of the continent being placed on the amber list for overseas travel, according to the health secretary.Matt Hancock said that people
